
#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <string>
#include <vector>
#include <algorithm>

using namespace std;

int check(string &a, string &b)
{
        int count =0;
        //cout << a << " " <<b << endl;
        if(a.at(0) != b.at(0))
                return -1;

        string::iterator  ita = a.begin();
        string::iterator  itb = b.begin();
        string::iterator  itaend = a.end();
        string::iterator  itbend = b.end();
        for( ; (ita!=itaend)&&(itb!=itbend);ita++,itb++)
        {
                if(*ita != *itb) return count;
                else count++;
        }
        //cout << "count = " << count << endl;
        return count;
}


int main()
{
        int n;
        scanf("%d",&n);

        vector <string> biga;

        int maxele=0;
        for(int i=0 ;i<n;i++)
        {
                char str[101];
                scanf("%s",&str);
                biga.push_back(str);
        }

        sort(biga.begin(),biga.end());

        vector <string> ::iterator it,j;
        vector <string> ::iterator itend = biga.end();


        for(it = biga.begin() ;it!=itend;it++)
        {
                j = it;
                j++;
                if(j==itend)break;

                int same = check(*it, *j);
                maxele = max(maxele,same);

        }
        printf("%d\n",maxele);
        return 0;
}
